thread.section_title: Cours et Pavillons - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Authentic Chinese 'Hutong' Experience!
thread.title_full: Authentic Chinese 'Hutong' Experience! - Review of Cours et Pavillons, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Anjooa
title: Authentic Chinese 'Hutong' Experience!
text:
Its a beautiful authentic luxury stay option for the discerning traveller! Ancient, authentic Chinese Couryard experience, with just 4 beautifully appointed rooms, with world class service! It even comes replete with a 3* Michelin Chef!
Service is charmingly personalized.
Only problem we had was with the transportation. Taxi's have never heard of this place, and since it is in a very narrow location, they don't want to take guests there. Due to the language problem, it is best to engage a Taxi for the duration of your stay!
Room Tip: Ask for the larger room. West room is a little small. See more room tips
